name: OCKAnyCarePlanStore
desc: A custom store that performs read/write operations on a care plan data type.

items.name: func addAnyCarePlan(OCKAnyCarePlan, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyCarePlan>?)
items.desc: Adds a care plan asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func addAnyCarePlans([OCKAnyCarePlan], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyCarePlan]>?)
items.desc: Adds an array of care plans asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func updateAnyCarePlan(OCKAnyCarePlan, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyCarePlan>?)
items.desc: Updates a care plan asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func updateAnyCarePlans([OCKAnyCarePlan], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyCarePlan]>?)
items.desc: Updates an array of care plans asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func deleteAnyCarePlan(OCKAnyCarePlan, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<OCKAnyCarePlan>?)
items.desc: Deletes a care plan asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func deleteAnyCarePlans([OCKAnyCarePlan], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyCarePlan]>?)
items.desc: Deletes an array of care plans asynchronously from the store.
